actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an automatic  deferment of Federal tax liability where a small business concern is owed money by the United States for goods and services furnished by such concern.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, for an automatic deferment of Federal tax liability where a small business concern is owed money by the United States for goods and services furnished by such concern. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 6158)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an automatic  deferment of Federal tax liability where a small business concern is owed money by the United States for goods and services furnished by such concern.
